summary: The Viet Cong was a communist group in South Vietnam during the Vietnam War. It was led by North Vietnam and wanted to unify Vietnam under communist rule. They fought against South Vietnam and the United States, using both guerrilla tactics and regular army units. The Viet Cong claimed to represent the people of South Vietnam, but others saw them as a tool of North Vietnam. Their most famous action was the Tet Offensive in 1968, attacking many cities. After the war, the Viet Cong merged with another group in 1977 when North and South Vietnam united.
title: Viet Cong
